name: diffx
catch: Semantic diff tool for structured data
description: Compare JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, INI, CSV ignoring key ordering and whitespace. Shows only meaningful changes.

og.title: diffx
og.description: Semantic diff tool for structured data

features.title: 6 File Formats
features.description: Auto-detect JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, INI, CSV.

features.title: Ignore Key Order & Whitespace
features.description: Highlights only meaningful changes. No noise.

features.title: Directory Comparison
features.description: Recursively compare entire folders. Great for config file diffs.

features.title: Python/Node.js Support
features.description: Install via pip or npm. Use from your favorite language.
